name: creocoder/yii2-flysystem
description: The flysystem extension for the Yii framework

suggest.creocoder/yii2-flysystem-aws-s3-v2: Allow you to use AWS S3 SDK v2 connector
suggest.creocoder/yii2-flysystem-dropbox: Allow you to use Dropbox connector
suggest.creocoder/yii2-flysystem-copy: Allow you to use Copy connector
suggest.creocoder/yii2-flysystem-rackspace: Allow you to use Rackspace connector
suggest.creocoder/yii2-flysystem-webdav: Allow you to use WebDAV connector
suggest.creocoder/yii2-flysystem-ziparchive: Allow you to use ZipArchive connector
